title: 4rcade
body: Wanting to create an innovative NFT collection, I curated open source games to develop a collection of 99 playable NFTs, all 1/1s, all free. Within two hours the floor price rose to 0.33 ETH.

title: Platformer
body: I used SystemVerilog on an FPGA to create a platformer that uses a system on chip to interface with an external keyboard and displays graphics to a monitor using a custom VGA controller.

title: Roadtripper
body: Using the latest COVID data, this tool turns the United States into a weighted graph, allowing it to perform algorithms to map the “safest” path from one state to another.

title: TxSender
body: This tool utilizes a private Alchemy RPC to seamlessly send raw transaction data with customizable gas settings from any number of wallets to the Ethereum blockchain.
